basic.description: This course provides students with opportunities to learn and practice basic procedural skills and tasks they use in a variety of health care settings during the clinical rotations in Years 3 and 4. The course prepares the student to begin to contribute meaningfully to real patient care from the first day of their first clerkship.
basic.subject: BMS
basic.title: Medicine 5: Preclerkship Preparation Boot Camp

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Matriculation to FSU College of Medicine MD program. Student must have taken USMLE Step 1.
